column2: Sprout Social, Inc. provides online social media management tools for businesses. The company is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. The firm provides organizations with a centralized platform to manage their social media efforts across stakeholders and business functions. Its solutions include enterprise, agencies, small business, social management, customer care, advocacy, and data and intelligence. The firm's all-in-one platform enables users to schedule posts, store assets, respond to messages, access customizable reports and use social listening across networks and profiles from a single log-in.
